definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.chinese: 在北方邦的所有政治基礎就是種姓。

sentences.english: He says the seven billionth person was likely to be a girl born in rural Uttar Pradesh.
sentences.chinese: 他說，七十億人可能是一個女孩出生在農村的北方邦。

sentences.english: Many parents in Uttar Pradesh are able to finance school and university education for their children.
sentences.chinese: 北方邦許多的父母都有能力爲孩子支付大學教育費用。

sentences.english: Indeed, the person whose guest i was hailed from UP and answered to the name of Agarwal.
sentences.chinese: 招待我的人就來自北方邦，名叫阿加瓦爾。

sentences.english: After several days, the pair returned to their village in western Uttar Pradesh, thinking that anger would have subsided.
sentences.chinese: 數年後，兩人回到西北方邦，以爲憤怒已經平息。

sentences.english: There are MAs, even PhDs, working in the fields of Uttar Pradesh.
sentences.chinese: 碩士們，甚至是博士們都在北方邦的農田裏勞作着。

definition: Punjab state in northwest India bordering Pakistan

pinyin: Ma3 ha1 la1 shi1 te4 la1 bang1

definition: Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]
pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1

definition: Karnataka, southwest Indian state, capital Bangalore 班加羅爾|班加罗尔[Ban1 jia1 luo2 er3]/formerly Mysore
Punjab state of India/Punjab province of Pakistan
Andhra Pradesh or Andhra State in southeast India
